article.title: Elbing_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: Elbingis the German name of Elblg, a city in northern Poland which until 1945 was a German city in the province of East Prussia.
article.heading: Places

list.listitem: Elblg (river), on which the city of Elblg is located
Elbing, Kansas, a city in USA

article.heading: Ships

list.listitem: SMS ElbingSMS ''Elbing'', light cruiser of the Imperial Germany Navy
Elbing class torpedo boatin the German Kriegsmarine during World War II
SSElbing, a cargo ship in service 1934-45

article.heading: See also

list.listitem: Treaty of Elbing, signed between the Dutch Republic and the Swedish Empire in 1656
